content: 23-24 cm long and 23 - 25 cm wide if we want to have the slips bigger we simply add some row more to the front and the back and we continue in the increasing in the same way then we make last row half_double_crochet chain 2 skip 1 single_crochet across and without fasten_off we crochet the edge trim on both sides of the pants crochet single_crochet evenly spaced across in every corner we make tying cords chain 70 80 and single_crochet back till the beginning and in both upper sides in every chain-2 space 1 single_crochet and 1 picot fasten_off weave in loos ends
